RW single

Source: R/rw_single_stan.R
rw_single_stan.Rd

RW single

Usage

rw_single_stan(num_data, Y, week_effect, DOW, ...)

Arguments

num_data

number of data points

Y

outcome variable, eg daily number of cases

week_effect

Number of distinct days in day of week effect. 1 = single effect shared by all days (essentially no DOW), 7 = each day a unique effect

DOW

integer of day of the week

...

Arguments passed to `rstan::sampling` (e.g. iter, chains).

Value

An object of class `stanfit` returned by `rstan::sampling`

On this page
